title: 安装mod之后开不了服
author: 花香维也纳つ
txt_content:
16:58:18 [SEVERE] Encountered an unexpected exception NoClassDefFoundError
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/entity/NpcMerchant
     at mod_ReiMinimap.getVersion(mod_ReiMinimap.java:16)
     at cpw.mods.fml.common.modloader.ModLoaderModContainer.getVersion(ModLoaderModContainer.java:416)
     at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.loadMods(Loader.java:507)
     at cpw.mods.fml.server.FMLServerHandler.beginServerLoading(FMLServerHandler.java:85)
     at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.onServerStart(FMLCommonHandler.java:350)
     at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:94)
     at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:690)
     at net.minecraft.server.ThreadMinecraftServer.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.minecraft.entity.NpcMerchant
     at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.RelaunchClassLoader.findClass(RelaunchClassLoader.java:273)
     at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
     at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
     ... 8 more
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
     at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.RelaunchClassLoader.findClass(RelaunchClassLoader.java:262)
     ... 10 more
2013-06-24 16:58:18 [SEVERE] This crash report has been saved to: E:\aaa\.\crash-reports\crash-2013-06-24_16.58.18-server.txt


1.51 mcpc的服务器Forge安装 下的mod拖入mods文件夹就显示这样，删除的话可以正常开服，请问如何解决？

replies.author: 张力
replies.txt_content: 如果是我的话，我就把它删了……

replies.author: dredgar
replies.txt_content:
我见你在贴吧发了
小地图不能装在服务器上

replies.author: MJC
replies.txt_content: 把小地图删了,小地图只能装客户端上，不能装服务端，不然会报错。
